column6:
A super hero community torn by civil war! A super-villain army united under the control of one very dangerous man! A game of cosmic proportions whose very escalation will both save and damn the planet Earth! And finally, a betrayal that will tear the Thunderbolts... and quite possibly, the entire universe...apart!,2006,10
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | inker:Gary Erskine | penciller (cover):Tom Grummett | writer:Fabian Nicieza | colorist:Chris Sotomayor | letterer:Richard Starkings
